languages.text: "Я не могу отделаться от дурного ощущения, что нам позволили сбежать. Этот "Ноктюрн" вряд ли смог провернуть свою "шалость" в центре Комморры без высокого покровительства".
"I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу отделаться от дурного ощущения, что нам позволили сбежать. Этот "Ноктюрн" вряд ли смог провернуть свою "шалость" в центре Комморры без высокого покровительства".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."
"I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."
"I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."
"I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

languages.text: “某种可怕的感觉在我脑海中挥之不去，那些异形其实是故意在纵容我们逃跑。如果没有上位者的许可，那个叫‘夜曲’的丑角绝对不敢在科摩罗的心脏地带搞这样的‘恶作剧’。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: “某种可怕的感觉在我脑海中挥之不去，那些异形其实是故意在纵容我们逃跑。如果没有上位者的许可，那个叫‘夜曲’的丑角绝对不敢在科摩罗的心脏地带搞这样的‘恶作剧’。”

languages.text: « Je ne peux me départir de l'impression qu'on nous a laissés nous échapper. Ce "Nocturne" n'aurait jamais pu réussir une telle "farce" en plein cœur de Commorragh sans l'accord de quelqu'un de haut placé. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux me départir de l'impression qu'on nous a laissés nous échapper. Ce "Nocturne" n'aurait jamais pu réussir une telle "farce" en plein cœur de Commorragh sans l'accord de quelqu'un de haut placé. »

languages.text: «No puedo evitar el siniestro pensamiento de que se nos ha permitido escapar. El tal "Nocturno" no podría haber gastado su "broma" en pleno corazón de Commorragh sin permiso de autoridades muy elevadas».
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo evitar el siniestro pensamiento de que se nos ha permitido escapar. El tal "Nocturno" no podría haber gastado su "broma" en pleno corazón de Commorragh sin permiso de autoridades muy elevadas».

languages.text: 「脱出するがままにさせられているという、不吉な感覚が拭えぬ。あの”ノクターン”が、コモラフの中心で制裁命令も出さずに”戯れ”をやめるとは考えにくい」
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: 「脱出するがままにさせられているという、不吉な感覚が拭えぬ。あの”ノクターン”が、コモラフの中心で制裁命令も出さずに”戯れ”をやめるとは考えにくい」

languages.text: "Ich kann das düstere Gefühl nicht abschütteln, dass man uns gestattet hat, zu fliehen. Dieser 'Nocturne' kann diesen 'Streich' im Herzen von Commorragh wohl kam ohne Genehmigung von weit oben durchgeführt haben."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann das düstere Gefühl nicht abschütteln, dass man uns gestattet hat, zu fliehen. Dieser 'Nocturne' kann diesen 'Streich' im Herzen von Commorragh wohl kam ohne Genehmigung von weit oben durchgeführt haben."

languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

languages.text: "Kaçmamıza izin verilmesine dair içimde kurtulamadığım kötü bir his var. 'Nöktürn', yukarılardan onay almasa malum 'şakasını' Commorragh'ın merkezinde yapamazdı."
languages.original_text: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçmamıza izin verilmesine dair içimde kurtulamadığım kötü bir his var. 'Nöktürn', malum 'şakasını' yukarılardan onay almasa Commorragh'ın kalbinde yapamazdı."
